with us

president of the United States of
America it is a great honor to be here
today at this UN Security Council

importance concerning and countering the
proliferation of deadly chemical

further development spread and use since

sinister threats many of us are rightly
focused on the dangers of nuclear

risk
by biological and chemical weapons the

twice imposed severe consequences on the
Assad regime for using chemical weapons
against innocent civilians

I announced earlier this year that the
United States would withdraw from the

it the most they were in big big trouble
they needed cash we gave it to him in

Iran's aggression only increased the

following America's withdrawal the

US nuclear-related sanctions will be in

any individual or entity who fails to

until denuclearization occurs however we

very very important but most importantly

many things are happening behind the

interviews working with president moon

acting together we can replace the
